Translations.Text: Ise$, macci ma tezzim udmawen nnwen, ar ugmuv akked utaram. Maca, ise$ d wid iumnen s Oebbi, s wass aneggaru, s lmalayek, s Tazmamt, s lambiyya. U ppaken ayla, $ef lemeibba S, i llzem, igujilen, igellilen, win d ibbwi ubrid, imapparen, akw i uberru n waklan. D wid ipeallan, ipzekkin, ippaiiafen di lemaahda nnsen, ma aahden, iueboiyen di lmeena akked twa$it, di tegwnip n ccqa. D wigi i illan di tidep, d wigi i ipeezziben

A wid iumnen! Iura fellawen ppao n tmegrav. Leeoo s leeoo, akli s wakli, nnta s nnta. Win iwumi isemmee gma s kra: ilaba s lewqama, feddu s lewqama. Ayagi, d sshala s$uo Mass nnwen, akked ueunu. Win iff$en abrid, deffir waya, ad isaaddi aaaqeb aqeoean
I kunwi, ppao d tameddurt, a yuaqilen. Amar a peezzbem
Iura fellawen: ma tusa d tmeppant, ar yiwen degwen, ma iooa d lxio, a t ifk i imawlan is, akked llzem, s lqanun. D ayen ilezmen i wid ipeezziben
Win it ibeddlen mbaad ma isla yas, abekkav is siwa $ef wid it ipbeddilen. Oebbi, s tidep, Issel, d Amusnaw
Ur idnib win iten issemualaeen acku iugad rrya, ne$ abekkav, s$uo win ippuweuuan. Oebbi, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
